document_data.name: Imgath's Guide to Etiquette
document_data.author: [[Imgath Gland]]
document_data.released: Before [[1370 DR]]{{Cite organized play/RPGA/The Mad Mage's Revenge|3}}
document_data.mainbody: '''''Imgath's Guide to Etiquette''''' was a [[book]] authored by [[Imgath Gland]], the author of ''[[Imgath's Guide to Stonemasonry]]'' and one of the authors of the ''[[Traveler's Guide to Silverymoon â€“ Inns, Taverns, and Local Law]]'', sometime before the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: A copy of ''Imgath's Guide to Etiquette'' belonged to [[Manshoon XII]], a clone of [[Manshoon]], in the {{YearlinkName|1370}}. The book was stored in the [[mage]]'s library of mundane and [[arcane]] tomes in his lair in an abandoned temple of [[Amaunator]] underneath the [[Waterdeep/City of the Dead|City of the Dead]] of [[Waterdeep]].
